title: 107_hr5404
content: Social Security Fairness Act of 2002 - Amends title II (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to: (1) provide that a monthly OASDI benefit shall be paid for the month in which the recipient dies, subject to a reduction of 50 percent if the recipient dies during the first 15 days of such month, and (2) increase the lump sum death payment.
